org.jboss.windup.reporting.model

Interface ApplicationReportIndexModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.frames.VertexFrame, WindupVertexFrame
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationReportIndexModel.Impl

    public interface ApplicationReportIndexModel
extends WindupVertexFrame
    This lists all of the top level reports within the application report (eg, Application classes report, Hibernate entity report, EJB report, etc). Potential uses include navigation bars within a report.
    Author:
    jsightler

      • getApplicationReportModelsSortedByPriority

      • addApplicationReportModel

      • getProjectModels

        Iterable<ProjectModel> getProjectModels()
        Associates a Set of ProjectModels with this index. This allows us to get from any Project Model to the associated index. NOTE: This should generally include the projectmodel and all child projects (flattened) to make searching easier.

      • addProjectModel

        void addProjectModel(ProjectModel projectModel)
        Associates a Set of ProjectModels with this index. This allows us to get from any Project Model to the associated index. NOTE: This should generally include the projectmodel and all child projects (flattened) to make searching easier.
